function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inconsistent temperature and humidity distribution","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variation in temperature conditions in the laboratory depending on location","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Intermittent loss of wifi communication in the laboratory","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Variation in relative humidity levels within the laboratory","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous increase in eco2 values despite open windows","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Connection loss due to low wifi signal","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Variation in values based on the position of the smart ieq sensor nodes","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Calibration errors due to imprecise sensor","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High eco2 levels in indoor environment","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate temperature and ventilation control in winter and summer","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation due to sensor malfunction or misconfiguration","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of sensors to detect symptoms may result in false positives or false negatives, leading to incorrect actions or delays in response.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate context parameters related to citizens’ distribution in the city","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on openstreetmap osm data for context parameters","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration of temporal characteristics in context parameters","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on osm data for identifying high-occupancy areas","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Occupancy model for safe navigation during a pandemic","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inferencing occupation level of amenities through rule-based system approach","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerability of different population groups to covid-19","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission risk based on age and health status","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of transmission risk and vulnerability","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate modeling of population behavior and characteristics","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Undefined level of vulnerability for different groups of people","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of association between vulnerability levels and specific groups of people","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Modeling association between people and transmission risk","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate inference of occupation levels and transmission risk","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of knowledge to obtain the danger model","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Representation of the city’s physical environment for navigation","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper representation in osm databases","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Abstract definition of danger areas","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identification of nodes in the surroundings of amenities can lead to the propagation of contagious diseases if these nodes are in close proximity to infected individuals or high-risk areas.","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of components in the architecture may lead to software bugs and errors that could impact the safe navigation service.","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate identification of high-risk areas for infection could lead to citizens being directed towards dangerous locations.","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of accurate risk assessment for routes could lead to high-risk paths being recommended, increasing the spread of covid-19","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Situations where people are in close proximity in the built environment","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"People using the web interface for surveys may be at risk of exposure to contagious diseases if the interface is not properly sanitized or if it requires physical interaction with shared surfaces.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation in the survey area could contribute to the spread of airborne contagious diseases.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shared devices or equipment in the survey area may serve as fomites for the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate updating of the danger model leading to incorrect risk assessment for different scenarios.","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate representation of danger levels","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on default google maps routes","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in danger levels of different routes","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in the number of dangerous spots visited within the same scenario","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in the number of dangerous points visited between different scenarios","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evidence of safer routes from a covid-19 point of view","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The reliance of the service on occupancy and danger models may introduce inaccuracies in identifying high-risk areas for covid-19 infection.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High infection rate and asymptomatic infection of covid-19","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unknown and sudden nature of the virus","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of spatiotemporal description in epidemic models","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incorporation of asymptomatic infectors and environmental infection in dynamic transmission models","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
